mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report (reported_post_id, reported_comment_id, reporter_user_id, reported_user_id, report_content, report_type_id, report_content_type) VALUES (#{reportedPostId}, #{reportedCommentId}, #{reporterUserId}, #{reportedUserId}, #{reportContent}, #{reportTypeId}, #{reportContentType})
mapper.select: SELECT r.report_id, r.reported_post_id, r.reported_comment_id, r.reporter_user_id, r.reported_user_id, r.report_content, r.report_type_id, r.report_content_type, rt.type_name FROM tb_report r JOIN tb_report_type rt ON r.report_type_id = rt.report_type_id

SELECT r.report_id, r.reported_post_id, r.reported_comment_id, r.reporter_user_id, r.reported_user_id, r.report_content, r.report_type_id, r.report_content_type, rt.type_name FROM tb_report r JOIN tb_report_type rt ON r.report_type_id = rt.report_type_id WHERE r.report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_report SET reported_post_id = #{reportedPostId}, reported_comment_id = #{reportedCommentId}, reporter_user_id = #{reporterUserId}, reported_user_id = #{reportedUserId}, report_content = #{reportContent}, report_type_id = #{reportTypeId}, report_content_type = #{reportContentType} WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
